mdRecord.dcterms:title: Alfred Caldwell Lily Pool, general view
Lincoln Park Lily Pool
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Caldwell, Alfred (American architect and engineer, 1903-1998) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Path down to shelter at pool's edge

A redesign and reimagining of "a Victorian-style artificially heated lily pool originally built in 1889 at the behest of Lincoln Park Commission Superintendent John Pettigrew to cultivate tropical water lilies."-- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfred_Caldwell_Lily_Pool [work]
